Posts.Content: abreast_of_life wrote: Dear Friends, I had a mastectomy in 2003, lost my mum to this illness last December.  This website is dedicated to her.  It is all based on reputable research and hope it helps save you time trawling the net.  I have been helped by the angels and am launching the American version soon.  Hopefully, I will continue to create more and more sites in other languages so that the info will reach many people worldwide.  Research proves that breast cancer is attributed 90% to lifestyle and only up to 10% herditary factors. The site is www.abreastoflife.co.uk Take best care. Love and blessings, Deborah Log in to post a reply
